property.name: Card Text
property.value: Effects cannot prevent you from moving this card. When your opponent successfully plays a 10D+ maneuver, or has 10+ greater Fortitude and he successfully plays a maneuver, you may put this card into your Ring from your hand or Ringside. If you do, after damage is applied from that card, end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 7 or more cards in hand, you may discard your hand and your opponent cannot respond to this card. Put 2 Backlash cards from your Ringside into your Backlash. If you discarded your hand, Ringside Search 2 non-Superstar-specific Virtual card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you would shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, you may instead shuffle half that many cards removed from the game, rounded up, into your Arsenal. You can pack Playin' a Mean Tune. You cannot pack Divine Intervention.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After you remove cards from your Ringside for the Heat trait, put 1 Heat card removed from the game into your hand, and 1 on the bottom of your Arsenal.

card.name: Silence Your Cell Phones, Hold Your Applause, and Shut Your Mouths!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent successfully plays an Action, subtract 1 from all numbers in its text, to a minimum of 1. ACE: When your opponent successfully plays a non-Superstar specific Action, you may remove this card from the game and choose one: either resolve a copy of the card's effects after your opponent does or blank the card's text and damage until the end of the turn.

card.name: Who Wants to Walk With Elias?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Before the first turn of the game, when you have 6- cards in hand, he may discard until he has 6- cards in hand: if he does, Arsenal Search 2 non-Reversal Heat and discard them; if he does not, Arsenal Search 6 non-Reversal Heat and discard them and he overturns cards equal to the number of cards in his hand.

card.name: The Biggest Acquisition in SmackDown Live History

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by 2 reversals. When this card would be removed from the game, instead put it into your Backlash. Your SmackDown maneuvers are Heat, and do not count as cards played this turn for the Heat trait.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent has 10+ greater Fortitude, you may put Playin' a Mean Tune from your hand or Ringside into your Backstage Card and then this card is F:0, your opponent cannot ignore its reversal restriction, and its damage may not be modified. Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal. Shuffle 2 non-reversal cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your opponent's Arsenal for 2 cards, remove them from the game, and shuffle. When this card is unsuccessful remove it from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a Heat card or as a Counter (Heat reversal). When played after WWE Stands For... or as a Counter (WWE Stands For…), this card is +5D. Shuffle 5 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is F:7. Your opponent overturns cards equal to the number of non-Heat maneuvers in his Ring. As a reversal, reverse any card with ‘Can only be played...’ text, or played after Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1: Draw 3 cards or your opponent discards 3 cards. ACE: You may skip your Draw Segment. If you do, your cards are considered Unique for your opponent's reversals this turn. This effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, discard any number of cards, then Arsenal Search 2. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver and put 1 Backlash card from your Ring or Ringside into your Backlash deck. When this card is in your Ring, ignore 'half' in your ability.

card.name: The Ballad of Every Town I've Ever Been To

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-maneuver card. When your opponent has a Venue in his Ring and you do not, completely reverse any card instead. The first time your opponent reverses a Heat maneuver each turn, your turn does not end, and you may play an additional Heat maneuver with a different title from Ringside that turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot choose to lose the game due to your Pre-match card effects. When you would choose one or more effects for your card effects, you may choose an additional effect; when your opponent must choose one or more effects for your card effects, he must choose an additional option. You can pack Mixed Martial Arts Specialist, An Ultimate Fighter and The Expendables.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each turn, when you play your first maneuver with 'judo' in the title, choose 1: it is Chain; it is Multi; or it is +10F, +10D, and +1 Stun.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When packing this card, you can pack Multi maneuvers with 'shoot' in the title as if you are a Male Superstar. Your maneuvers with 'shoot' in the title are not Cheater. When played as a Counter, your maneuvers with 'judo' in the title cannot be reversed by non-Superstar-specific D:2+ reversals. When your maneuver with 'judo' or 'shoot' in the title is unsuccessful, choose one: put 1 other maneuver with 'judo' or 'shoot' in the title from your Ringside to your hand, he discards 1 card, or draw 1 card and put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

card.name: I Don’t Give a Damn About My Reputation

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot respond to this card. # is equal to both players' combined Superstar Values. When your Fortitude is equal or higher, your next maneuver this turn is +#D and can only be reversed by Unique reversals. When your Fortitude is equal or lower, your next maneuver is -#F and can only be reversed from Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring and you successfully play a maneuver, put this card into your Backstage. While this card is in your Backstage, your Superstar Value is 0 and your opponent’s non-Superstar-specific cards with ‘Superstar Value’ in the text are blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, cannot be reversed from hand unless your opponent discards 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse any non-Unique maneuver. When your next card played is Maintain Hold, you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...' text, and when that card is successful, you win the game via Pinfall.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring and you reverse a card from anywhere except your Arsenal, remove the reversed card from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When played after a 3D+ maneuver, this card is Multi. When played after From the Top Rope, this card can only be reversed from Arsenal. Arsenal Search Rip Your Arm Off. When this card is in your Ringside, you may skip your Draw Segment and put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Can only be reversed from Arsenal. When successfully played, opponent overturns 3 cards. This effect cannot be reversed. After damage has been applied, choose one: Draw 1, discard 2 to put this card back in hand, or discard 2 to Arsenal Search Superman Knee Strike.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card requires 3 reversals instead of 2. When this card is in your Ringside or unsuccessful, it is considered to have 'judo' and 'shoot' in the title.

card.name: Damn The Man And Screw The Woo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses one: He discards 2 cards, he overturns 2 cards, or you remove 2 cards in his Ringside from the game. When your opponent is a Male Superstar, or has a card with the Becky Lynch, Charlotte, or Stephanie McMahon logos in their Ring, once during each of your turns you may shuffle this card from your Ring or Ringside into your Arsenal and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose one: Shuffle up to 8 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, Arsenal Search 1 non-Superstar-specific maneuver with ‘arm’ in the title or draw up to 4 cards. When your next card played this turn is a Grapple, Submission, or Trademark Finisher with ‘arm’ in the title, it is +5D and reversals to that card are +25F.

card.name: The Baddest B!tch on the Planet

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When playing this card, ignore reversal restrictions from cards and effects. Completely reverse any non-Superstar-specific maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When he reverses your maneuver with 'judo' or 'shoot' in the title, your opponent chooses 1: He flips a card in his Ring face-down, you may Opponent's Arsenal Search 1 and remove it from the game, or you must remove 1 face-down card in his Ring from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your maneuver or Superstar-specific card is reversed from hand, you may overturn 3 cards and continue your turn; if you do and your next card played is a maneuver, it is +3D for every time you used your Ability this turn. You can pack High-Flying Style.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a 2D+ maneuver and it was not reversed from Arsenal you may end your turn and then before the Draw Segment of your opponent's next turn, he chooses one: He overturns 3 cards or you may put up to 3 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent cannot prevent you from playing this card. Your Pre-match Capacity is +2. When your maneuver is unsuccessful he cannot Activate non-Superstar-specific cards during his next turn. ACE: You may remove Hurricanrana in your hand from the game to reverse a non-Unique maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The first High Risk played on each of your turns is Chain when you have lower Fortitude or fewer cards in hand. When you do not have a High Risk in your Ring, ignore 'Submission' in the text of your Unorthodox Style of Wrestling.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter (D: 5+ card) or after a D: 5+ maneuver, cannot be reversed by non-Unique cards. Once during each of your turns when this card is in your hand, you may discard it and Promo: 2.

card.name: Double Knee Smash in the Corner

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter or after Throw into the Corner Turnbuckle. Your opponent discards 2 random cards, and you may Promo: 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D+ maneuver or as a Counter (5D+ maneuver). Ringside Search 1, and your opponent puts 1 random card from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal; when you did not use your Ability this turn, double those numbers. When this card is reversed from hand and you use your Ability, put this card into your hand regardless of other effects, you may disregard the 'Can only be played...' text for the rest of the turn, this card is -5D, and cannot be reversed from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful card. Cannot be reversed when played after a Set-up; when it is not, can only be reversed by D:0 reversal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -5F, and when played as a Counter, can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This is considered a 2D+ maneuver for Tranquilo Style, and when you have lower Fortitude it is -5F. As an action, shuffle this card into your Arsenal. When this is the next card played after using your Ability, it can only be reversed from Arsenal.As a reversal, reverse any non-Superstar-specific Action, any Set-up card, or any card played after a Set-up. Shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal and draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -6F, cannot be reversed and can only be played when you play Hurricanrana. Unless both cards are reversed, both are considered successful. As a reversal, reverse any non-Superstar-specific maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 10 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, and your opponent overturns # cards, where # is 10- the number of cards moved from your Ringside. Your next card played this turn is -10F and his Fortitude Rating is considered -10F for playing reversals to it. When the total damage in your Ring is 100+, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may allow your opponent to draw 1 card and then Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique Multi maneuver. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, his non-Superstar-specific 4F- maneuvers are blank when successful. You can pack A Family Legacy, No Sell Maneuver and Multi maneuvers as if you are a Male Superstar. You cannot pack Evening Gown Match or non-maneuver cards with 'packed by a Female' in the text (except Title Belts and The Era of the Superstar).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you may pack non-Multi cards with 'face', 'fist' or 'punch' in the title as if they are not Volley or Smackdown. Your non-Face cards with 'face' and 'punch' in the title cannot have their Fortitude or Damage modified by other cards and count as Multi maneuvers for your Superstar Ability and card effects.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After all Pre-match have been resolved, all players discard # cards, where # is the number of cards in their hand greater than 8 (when that player is a Diva, greater than 6). Once during each of your turns, when you successfully play a Multi maneuver, he may shuffle 1 random card from his hand into his Arsenal. If he does not, you may Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique Multi card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal this is -10D, reverse any card played after a Set-Up or any Strike. When played, your opponent randomly reveals 3 cards in his hand; he cannot play them or discard them to his effects, and after damage has been applied shuffle them into his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D+ maneuver. This card is +#D, where # is the total Stun Value in your Ring, and when you have Nia's Samoan Drop in your Ring, this card cannot be reversed from Arsenal by non-Superstar-specific cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D+ maneuver or as a Counter (5D+ maneuver). Cannot be reversed from hand. When this card is in your hand or Ringside, once during each of your turns you may reveal it, put it at the bottom of your Arsenal, and Ringside Search 1 non-Superstar-specific Multi maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may search for this card as if it were non-Unique. Can only be played after a successfully played Multi maneuver or as a Counter. Your opponent shuffles 2 random cards from his hand into his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -4F and +4D, your opponent shuffles 1 random card from his hand into his Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Grapple or High Risk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude is 0 and your opponent has 10F+ greater, this is -10F and can only be reversed from Arsenal. Draw up to 2 cards, and he shuffles 1 random card from his hand into his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle 5 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal and Ringside Search 1. As a reversal, reverse any non-Trademark Finisher maneuver or non-damage card effect; when overturned, put this card into your Ring. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may reveal a Nia Jax-specific card from your hand and then shuffle it into your Arsenal and draw two cards; when your opponent is Female, this effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is +1F for every D:1+ Pre-match card in your Ring. As an action, this card is -6F and can be reversed by reversal cards that would reverse a Strike or Grapple. As a reversal, reverse any non-maneuver card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 2 Multi maneuvers from your Ringside into your hand. Your first maneuver played during your next turn is +5D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards with 'blindside' in the title cannot be moved from your Ringside by your opponent's effects. During any turn when you successfully play a card with the Tag logo or with 'tag team' in the text, your opponent discards a card. You may pack reversals with the Tag logo. You may not pack any title belts except the Tag Team Title Belts.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards with 'wrestling' or 'fight' in the title do not take up Pre-match or Mid-match slots in your Ring. Your cards titled Ready to Fight are Superstar-specific. When you reverse a card to end your opponent's turn, during your next turn he must flip 1 card in his Ring face down to reverse your cards with 'blindside' in the title from hand or Backlash. When your maneuver with 'blindside' in the title is played as a Counter (reversal with the Tag Logo), he must remove 1 card in his hand from the game to play reversals to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when Old School Wrestling Match is in your Ring. When you would remove cards from your reversals with 'blindside' in the title, remove half the number of cards (rounded up) instead. When you overturn for card effects, you may put 1 non-hybrid maneuver overturned on the bottom of your Arsenal. When you play Shut Up and Wrestle! you may put the top 3 cards of your Arsenal under that card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by 2 reversals when you have a Title Belt in your Ring. Put all copies of Ready to Fight from your Ringside into your Backlash or shuffle 6 cards in your Ringside into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring, whenever you play Ready to Fight your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, cannot be reversed from Backlash; when played as a Counter (reversal with 'blindside' in the title or Superstar-specific card) or after a maneuver, cannot be reversed from hand by non-Unique cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when played as a Counter, can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards. As a reversal, completely reverse any Strike or non-maneuver card and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, you may reveal a maneuver with 'leverage' in the title in your hand. If you do, immediately play that card, regardless of its text, and if both maneuvers are not reversed, they are both successful and after damage has been applied end your turn. If you do not, this card is Multi. You may remove a non-Pre-match card in his Ring from the game

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, Ringside Search 2 Strike maneuvers and draw up to 2 cards. As a reversal, this card is 0F. Completely reverse any High Risk and your opponent discards 2 random cards. When this card is in your Ring and you play a non-High Risk maneuver draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, this card can only be reversed by 2 reversals. When this card is in your Ring, your non-Volley Multi maneuvers gain the Tag logo.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have higher Fortitude, cannot be reversed from Backlash. Shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal equal to the number of cards with the Tag logo in your Ring. When you have 5+ cards with the Tag logo in your Ring, he discards 5 cards.

card.name: Our Bite is Worse Than Our Bark

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is +1F for each Pre-match and Action in your Ring. Reverse any non-Unique card. During your next turn, your maneuvers are -5F and +5D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played from Ringside. When your first card played each turn is a maneuver from Ringside or has the Tag logo, it is Multi and can only be reversed by 2 reversals.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards with 'technical' in the title are not Set-ups. Once during your turn, you may discard 1 card and choose Chain, Heat or Volley: 4. Your maneuvers with 'technical' in the title are considered to have that trait until the start of your next turn. Do not remove Heat cards from the game for your Superstar-specific card effects.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you may pack up to 1 Chain Reaction, 1 Spontaneous Combustion, 1 The Opening Volley and, 1 Technically Sound and Brutal in your Backstage. They are Unique and Superstar-specific. At the end of the Pre-match phase you may put those cards into your Ring. Your ’Technical’ and ‘Dynamic’ maneuvers are considered to have both ‘Dynamic’ and ‘Technical’ in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When you have lower Fortitude, your opponent does not draw for his reversal effects and you may overturn the same number of cards instead of discarding for your Ability. Your first maneuver played each turn with 'technical' in the title cannot be reversed by Hold the Phone or Shoot Counter. Double the numbers on your Chain Reaction, Spontaneous Combustion and Technically Sound and Brutal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent has 3+ reversals in his Ring and your maneuver is unsuccessful put this card into your Ring and then draw 2 cards. You may choose up to 2 effects for your Ability. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you make remove 1 card with 'technical' in your Ring from the game and then your opponent removes 2 random non-Heat cards in his Ringside from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by non-Unique reversals or Escape Move. Cannot be reversed from Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Grapple (including Shake).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -6F and can only be played as a Counter. As a reversal, reverse any card that would move cards from any Ring or Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, cannot be reversed from hand. Your opponent discards 3 cards and your next maneuver played this turn is considered Chain, Heat and Volley: 4.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card reverses, even from Arsenal, put it in your Ring instead of any other location. Shuffle cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal equal to the Fortitude of the reversed card. When you have 15+ lower Fortitude, replace ‘double’ with ‘triple' on your Johnny Wrestling.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once a turn whenever you overturn a Face or Heel card for your Superstar-specific effect, or when you successfully play a non-Backlash Face or Heel card and damage has been applied, you may remove that card from the game. Once a turn, when you remove your Face or Heel card from the game with a Superstar-specific effect, your opponent looks at the top 3 cards of his Arsenal, removes 2 from the game and shuffles.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you remove your card from the game for your Superstar Ability, you may put that card under this card, discard 1 card and then your opponent reveals 2 random cards in his hand. Once during each of your turns you may put 1 of your Face or Heel cards removed from the game under this card, and then put 1 card in your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. When you have 10+ cards under this card, all numbers in your Superstar Ability are +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before the Draw Segment of your first turn of the game look at the top 6 cards of your Arsenal, put them on the top and/or bottom in any order and overturn 1 card. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal and then put them at the top and/or bottom in any order, and then overturn 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is unsuccessful, look at your opponent's hand, choose 2 cards and he discards them. Overturn 2 cards and put 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring and he reveals cards for The Sicilian Psychopath, he discards one of those cards and you may put 1 card in your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when successfully played, Promo: 4, put 1 card on top of your Arsenal and the rest on the bottom of your Arsenal. Overturn 1 card. You may repeat this up to 2 more times. As a reversal, when played from hand, reverse any Strike or non-maneuver card. When this card is in your Ring, when you overturn cards for any non-damage card effects, you may instead put them on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have Face cards in your Ringside, this card is Chain. When you have Heel cards in your Ringside, this card is Multi. When you do not have any Face or Heel cards in your Ringside, this card is a Trademark Finisher.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by D:2+ reversals. When successfully played, you may put 1 card from your Ringside on top of your Arsenal and overturn 1 card. When successfully played and it is not reversed from Arsenal, you may overturn 1 card and put this back in your hand. You cannot play this card for the rest of your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal and put them on the top and/or bottom in any order. Overturn 1 card. When this card is in your Ring, whenever you overturn a card for a non-damage effect, you may discard 2 cards. If you do, the overturned card is considered to be Face and Heel for your ability, but it is blank. When this card reverses from Arsenal, put in your Ring instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your maneuver played as a Counter is unsuccessful, put a maneuver with a different title from your Ringside into your hand. When it is successful, you may Promo: 3. You can pack Becky Lynch cards in your Arsenal with 1 logo and I Am The Man.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be played during the Venue phase. Your Superstar-specific maneuvers are considered to have ‘precision’ in the title for your Superstar-specific card effects. When your opponent’s card is unsuccessful, you may put To Be the Man, You've Got to Beat the Man! from your Backlash into your Ring. You cannot have more than 1 copy of that card in your Ring, it does not take up a slot, it is Permanent and replace '10' with 'higher Fortitude or 10.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent is a Male Superstar, reverse any maneuver. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, ignore any reversal restriction from a card and reverse any non-Unique maneuver. Ignore 'played as a Counter' in your Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, -8F and cannot be reversed from hand. When played as a reversal, you may play a maneuver in your Ringside as if from hand if it is your first card played during your next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: -5F for each Title Belt in your Ring (maximum -10F). Look at your opponent’s hand, choose 2 cards for each Title Belt in your Ring and he discards them. When you have no Title Belt in your Ring, shuffle 15 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.
